title: ITOT, FB, GOOG, GOOGL: Large Inflows Detected at ETF - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the iShares Core S&P Total U.S. Stock Market ETF (Symbol: ITOT) where we have detected an approximate $66.5 million dollar inflow -- that's a 0.3% increase week over week in outstanding units (from 332,700,000 to 333,700,000). Among the largest underlying components of ITOT, in trading today Facebook Inc (Symbol: FB) is up about 2.1%, Alphabet Inc (Symbol: GOOG) is up about 2.1%, and Alphabet Inc (Symbol: GOOGL) is higher by about 2%. For a complete list of holdings, visit the ITOT Holdings page » The chart below shows the one year price performance of ITOT, versus its 200 day moving average:
